RC2 test release is coming (really) real soon

published 27 Nov 2004

I didn’t post anything for a while now. So, to just let everyone know, Timo and me are finally finished with our planned changes for RC2. We are going to upload a testing version next week and if everything works correctly the official RC2 is coming a few days afterwards…So, stay tuned!
